verses.text: Behold, how \w good|strong="H2896"\w* and how \w pleasant|strong="H5273"\w* \add it is\add* for \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* in \w unity|strong="H3162"\w*!\f + \fr 133.1 \ft together…: Heb. even together\f*

\add It is\add* like the \w precious|strong="H2896"\w* \w ointment|strong="H8081"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, that ran \w down|strong="H3381"\w* upon the \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*, \add even\add* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*: that went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w skirts|strong="H6310"\w* of his \w garments|strong="H4060"\w*;

As the \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* of \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w*, \add and as the dew\add* that \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2042"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: for there the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*, \add even\add* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* for \w evermore|strong="H5769"\w*.
